channel.title: Help on shops (please look, its very simple answer but i don't know it)
channel.description: Yes, this is a simple question. I haven't really worked with shops yet. I figured out how to change the item\the amount in, but i don't know how to change\set prices. Any help?[br][br][size=1]Posted on: November 07, 2009, 09:46:54 pm[/size][hr]Please? [br][br][size=1]Posted on: November 07, 2009, 10:28:34 pm[/size][hr]Somebody help... i need this figured out, [br][br][size=1]Posted on: November 07, 2009, 10:38:50 pm[/size][hr]PLEASE PLEASE

item.title: Help on shops (please look, its very simple answer but i don't know it)
item.dc:creator: @ryan_justin ryan justin
item.description:
@ryan_justin wrote:

im pretty sure the prices of items in shops are based on the actual item found in item.cfg

the first three values next to the item id name and description are buy, sell and alch values (not sure the order).

so you would go into your item cfg search the item you want to edit the price of and change one or more of those values, youll have to

find out which ones which with somone else.

Read full topic
